tier.item: (2) An thelis kalo tiri dhen echis para na pas sto

tier.item: (ii) o Yanis erchete apo tin Kalifornia me to treno. Ala aftin tin stigmi ine mono
the John comes from the California with the train. But this the moment is only
sto Chicago. Dhen tha ftasi eggeros ya ton gamo.
in the Chicago. neg FUT arrive on time for the wedding
`John is coming from California by train. At this point, he is only in Chicago. He will not
arrive in time for the wedding.'
